FuncDef: The reset cpu-usage record command clears CPU usage statistics on a device.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before collecting CPU usage statistics of devices in a specified period, run the
reset cpu-usage record command to delete existing statistics.
Run the reset cpu-usage record command to delete CPU usage statistics of the main control board.Run the reset cpu-usage record slot command to delete CPU usage statistics of the specified board.Run the reset cpu-usage record all command to delete the CPU usage statistics of all boards.

Precautions
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
The CPU usage statistics cannot be restored after they are deleted. Exercise caution when running the reset cpu-usage record command.
